nodes.text: Dolovite was a substance mined on the lava world of Mustafar and Samovar. Kongo the Disemboweler once dwelled in the dolovite mines. It was also present on Burnin Konn, one of the four primary mining worlds of the Anoat sector.
It could be refined into a polished crimson colored alloy that was suitable for use in lightsaber construction.
